TopicTitle: Can you get multiple ships on the runway?

Articles.Content: Is it possible to got multiple ships on the runway??? if so How?
Launch one, move it off the runway, launch another (as many as you want) and put the first one on the runway. I'm not sure if that's exactly what you were asking, but it works.

My only sugestion other than DeeJay's would be build them all as one-ish(put sepatons between them and launch the whole thing then seperate them.

~Gizmo~
